ElementAriaReadOnly.summary: The ariaReadOnly property of the interface reflects the value of the aria-readonly attribute, which indicates that the element is not editable, but is otherwise operable.

blockquote.para: Note: Where possible use an HTML input element with type="text" or a textarea as these have built in semantics and do not require ARIA attributes.

ElementAriaReadOnly.value: A string with one of the following values:
